name: TheMafia.club
description:
themafia.club is a game based off the meme "thats how mafia works". Fight your way from a level 1 boss to a level 35 mafia boss. Shoot banks to get money, drive cars, collect money off the street, and fight the cops who will protect the banks. The game is a bit weird right now but hey, thats how mafia works :D 

WASD to move 

Click to shoot 

E to build 

space to get in cars 

Join the discord server/follow me on twitter for more games and updates on this game
